2025-0792
2025-11-13VACPublic Service Employment ActRe-appointment of the special adviser to the Minister of Veterans Affairs, to be known as the Veterans’ OmbudspersonRe-appointment of Nishika Jardine of Alliston, Ontario, to be special adviser to the Minister of Veterans Affairs, to be known as the Veterans’ Ombudsperson, to hold office for a term of three years, effective November 23, 2025.N/A
subject: Re-appointment of the special adviser to the Minister of Veterans Affairs, to be known as the Veterans’ Ombudsperson
precis: Re-appointment of Nishika Jardine of Alliston, Ontario, to be special adviser to the Minister of Veterans Affairs, to be known as the Veterans’ Ombudsperson, to hold office for a term of three years, effective November 23, 2025.
